title: Match Bases
text: With all term containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$x \left(x+3\right)=10$$. We can simplify it into $$x^2+3x-10=0$$. We can factor the quadratic and get $$\left(x+5\right) \left(x-2\right)=0$$ which has $$x=-5$$ and $$x=2$$ as solutions.

title: Check for Constrains
text: Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, $$b$$ can not be negative. We can omit the negative answer and get $$x=2$$ as the only solution for the equation.
